VIEW ALL PROJECTS

OUR PROCESS

Beyond
Branding

VIEW ALL PROJECTS

01

Discovery Phase: We begin by getting to know your business in and out. Through in-depth discussions and research, we uncover your brand’s values, mission, and target audience.

02

Strategy Development: Once we have a clear understanding of your brand, we develop a customized branding strategy tailored to your specific goals and objectives.

03

Design and Development: Our talented designers bring your brand to life with visually stunning logos, graphics, and other creative elements that capture the essence of your brand.

04

Implementation: With your approval, we roll out your new brand across all touchpoints, ensuring consistency and coherence across every platform.

05

Evaluation and Optimization: We continuously monitor the performance of your brand and make adjustments as needed to ensure that it remains relevant and impactful in today’s ever-changing market.

At Brandemic, we craft unforgettable brand experiences that truly connect with your audience.

LET'S COLLABORATE

OUR OFFERINGS

Our core branding services are complemented by a variety of complementary services designed to optimize the impact of your brand.

Logo Design

Crafting logos that scream “You can’t ignore me!”

  • - Bold, unforgettable designs
  • - Perfect for any platform
  • - Embodies your brand's vibe
  • - Polished and professional flair

Packaging Design

Packaging that’s not just pretty, but powerful.

  • - Eye-popping, functional designs
  • - Eco-friendly options
  • - Tailored to your product
  • - Protects while wowing customers

Typography

Fonts that speak your brand’s language.

  • - Unique, custom-made fonts
  • - Matches your brand's voice
  • - Easy to read and versatile
  • - Adds that extra visual punch

Iconography

Icons that are as sharp as your wit.

  • - Custom designs for clarity
  • - Consistent and stylish
  • - Perfect for any application
  • - Enhances user experience

Illustration

Illustrations that make your brand pop.

  • - Custom, one-of-a-kind artwork
  • - Tells your brand's story
  • - Versatile across all media
  • - Captivates your audience

Brand Patterns

Patterns that make heads turn.

  • - Unique, standout designs
  • - Perfectly aligns with your brand
  • - Adaptable for any use
  • - Boosts brand recognition

Brand Collaterals

All the swag your brand needs to shine.

  • - Business cards and letterheads
  • - Brochures and flyers
  • - Presentation templates
  • - Branded merchandise designs

TESTIMONIALS

Words from Our Valued Clients

Working with Brandemic has been a great experience. Their deep understanding of our vision and values enabled them to craft a brand identity that truly reflects who we are as a pre-seed investor. Moreover, the team was highly collaborative, creative, and detail-oriented throughout the process, ensuring everything was seamless and impactful.
Pearl AgarwalFounder and Managing Director at Eximius Ventures
Young, energetic and enthusiastic team. They are always willing to work with you in an iterative manner. It was a pleasure working with the entire Brandemic team. I would rehire them for any future needs that our firm might have.
Krishna RaoFounder - Terra Lapis
We engaged with Brandemic for a complete redesign of our logo and website, and the experience was exceptional. The team demonstrated creativity, proactivity, and genuine interest in our project. They welcomed feedback and managed timelines impeccably. We wholeheartedly recommend Brandemic and are incredibly satisfied with the final results.
Chaitra MaheshFounder - Untangle
Great work by the company! We found them on Google, and they delivered outstanding services. We truly appreciate the team's efforts. This creative agency excels in website development and offers additional services like SEO and content writing. The young, energetic team is impressive.
Harsh WadhwaniFounder - Vergo Online
Fantastic team of passionate and skilled branding professionals. Efficient and hardworking, they helped us build our website and overall brand design. Highly recommend for branding/content services.
Rohit GodiwalaVP - Turmeric Capital
Amazing work! Highly recommended. We recently had our brand website redesigned and our entire branding refreshed by them. The results exceeded our expectations, and we couldn't be happier with the outcome.
Kavya SethiCo-Founder - Jisora
Having worked with many agencies, I feel Brandemic is unmatched in professionalism. They meet deadlines, have a creative team, and I've enjoyed all my interactions. I'm very happy with my UI/UX output and plan to work with them on other business verticals. Glad to have found them.
Nidhi SurekhaFounder - Equipp
We sincerely appreciate your fantastic UX design work for our upcoming product website. Your illustrations perfectly capture the vibe we're aiming for. The team's responsiveness and openness to feedback, especially with the quick turn-around on mobile screens, have been impressive. While we're thrilled with the overall work, there's always room for growth, particularly in fine-tuning the content to make it more impactful.
Shilpa KalaturFounder - Trooque
Highly recommended for designing, website, or branding services! Brandemic has an amazing team who supported us throughout the process. Very happy with their response to all our queries. Thank you, Brandemic Team, for elevating our brand story!
Vinay MiraniFounder - SwagLabs
Brandemic has a team of young, talented, and creative professionals. They provide end-to-end solutions for branding, website, marketing, and more. They did a fantastic job on our new skincare brand, K’LUXE. Highly recommend for revamping existing brands or starting new ones. Thank you, Brandemic!
Kashyap BhedaFounder - K'luxe

FAQs

Know The Process

FAQs

Know the Process

What is branding, and why is it important for my business?
Branding encompasses the visual and verbal elements that represent your business, including your logo, color scheme, messaging, and overall identity. It’s important because it helps differentiate your business from competitors, builds trust and credibility with customers, and creates emotional connections that drive loyalty and repeat business.
How do I know if my brand needs a refresh or revitalization?

Several signs indicate it might be time for a brand refresh or revitalization, including outdated visuals, inconsistent messaging, a decline in brand awareness or relevance, or changes in your target audience or market landscape. If your brand no longer accurately reflects your business or resonates with your audience, it may benefit from a refresh.

What is the difference between a brand strategy and a brand identity?

A brand strategy is an overarching plan that guides your branding efforts, including your brand’s positioning, messaging, target audience, and competitive differentiation. On the other hand, a brand identity is the visual and verbal expression of your brand, including elements like your logo, colour palette, typography, and tone of voice.

How do I maintain consistency in my branding efforts?

Consistency is crucial for building a strong brand identity and reinforcing brand recognition. To maintain consistency, it’s important to develop comprehensive brand guidelines that outline how your brand assets should be used across all communication channels. This includes guidelines for your logo, colour palette, typography, imagery, and messaging.

How long does it take to see results from branding initiatives?
The timeline for seeing results from branding initiatives can vary depending on factors such as the scope of the project, the competitiveness of your market, and the effectiveness of your branding strategy. While some results may be immediate, such as increased brand awareness or website traffic, it often takes time to see the full impact of branding efforts in terms of customer loyalty and business growth.
LET'S COLLABORATE

If you’re looking for a holistic agency to work on your big dream, just say the magic words!
LET'S COLLABORATE
